name: Seal Vendetta
description:
Venture into the depths of the enemy’s lair, gathering the hostages, and fighting off the corrupted seals. As you go, build up a team to fight the enemy!

The game has an audio track, so make sure you have your volume TURNED UP!

Move around using arrow keys or W A S D

Click on the screen to shoot at enemies! BEWARE you will be sacrificing a part of your comrade with each shot! You have to make them count!

If you will run out of allies you will not be able to shoot anymore!

You have to be careful and use your comrades as a shield, any blow form an enemy will result in a game over.

Each defeated enemy will release a couple of your comrades, so make sure to defeat as much of them as possible!

Made by Sofia Trevino and Danila Grobov.
